metadata.title: Wicked: For Good
metadata.overview: As an angry mob rises against the Wicked Witch, Glinda and Elphaba will need to come together one final time. With their singular friendship now the fulcrum of their futures, they will need to truly see each other, with honesty and empathy, if they are to change themselves, and all of Oz, for good.

With their singular friendship now the fulcrum of their futures, they will need to truly see each other, with honesty and empathy, if they are to change themselves, and all of Oz, for good.

omdb.Title: Wicked: For Good
omdb.Writer: Winnie Holzman, Dana Fox, L. Frank Baum
omdb.Actors: Peter Dinklage, Jonathan Bailey, Jeff Goldblum
omdb.Plot: Elphaba, the future Wicked Witch of the West and her relationship with Glinda, the Good Witch of the North. The second of a two-part feature film adaptation of the Broadway musical.

snippet.title: Wicked: For Good | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The epic conclusion comes to theaters this November. Watch the #WickedForGood trailer now  üßπü´ß

Pre-save ‚ÄòWicked: For Good ‚Äì The Soundtrack‚Äô at https://wickedthesoundtrack.com
-----
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wickedmovie
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wickedmovie
X: https://twitter.com/wickedmovie
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wickedmovie
Official Site: https://wickedmovie.com

And now whatever way our stories end, I know you have rewritten mine by being my friend ‚Ä¶

Last year‚Äôs global cinematic cultural sensation, which became the most successful Broadway film adaptation of all time, now reaches its epic, electrifying, emotional conclusion in Wicked: For Good. 

Directed once again by award-winning director Jon M. Chu and starring the spectacular returning cast, led by Academy Award¬Æ nominated superstars Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, the final chapter of the untold story of the witches of Oz begins with Elphaba and Glinda estranged and living with the consequences of their choices. 

Elphaba (Cynthia Erivo), now demonized as The Wicked Witch of the West, lives in exile, hidden within the Ozian forest while continuing her fight for the freedom of Oz‚Äôs silenced Animals and desperately trying to expose the truth she knows about The Wizard (Jeff Goldblum).  

Glinda, meanwhile, has become the glamorous symbol of Goodness for all of Oz, living at the palace in Emerald City and reveling in the perks of fame and popularity. Under the instruction of Madame Morrible (Oscar¬Æ winner Michelle Yeoh), Glinda is deployed to serve as an effervescent comfort to Oz, reassuring the masses that all is well under the rule of The Wizard.  

As Glinda‚Äôs stardom expands and she prepares to marry Prince Fiyero (Olivier award winner and Emmy and SAG nominee Jonathan Bailey) in a spectacular Ozian wedding, she is haunted by her separation from Elphaba. She attempts to broker a conciliation between Elphaba and The Wizard, but those efforts will fail, driving Elphaba and Glinda only further apart. The aftershocks will transform Boq (Tony nominee Ethan Slater) and Fiyero forever, and threaten the safety of Elphaba‚Äôs sister, Nessarose (Marissa Bode), when a girl from Kansas comes crashing into all their lives. 

As an angry mob rises against the Wicked Witch, Glinda and Elphaba will need to come together one final time. With their singular friendship now the fulcrum of their futures, they will need to truly see each other, with honesty and empathy, if they are to change themselves, and all of Oz, for good. 

Wicked: For Good also stars Emmy nominee Bowen Yang and Bronwyn James as Glinda‚Äôs fawning assistants, Pfannee and ShenShen and BAFTA and Grammy nominee Sharon D. Clarke (Caroline, or Change) as the voice of Elphaba‚Äôs childhood nanny, Dulcibear. 

The film is produced by returning Tony and Emmy winning powerhouse Marc Platt p.g.a. and by multiple Tony winner David Stone. The executive producers are Stephen Schwartz, David Nicksay, Jared LeBoff, Winnie Holzman and Dana Fox. The first film, Wicked, released in November 2024, earned 10 Academy Award¬Æ nominations, including Best Picture, and won the Oscars¬Æ for Costume Design and Production Design. To date, the film has grossed $750 million worldwide. 

Wicked: For Good is based on the generation-defining musical stage play with music and lyrics by legendary Grammy and Oscar¬Æ winning composer and lyricist Stephen Schwartz and book by Winnie Holzman, from the bestselling novel by Gregory Maguire. The screenplay is by Winnie Holzman and Winnie Holzman & Dana Fox. The film score is by John Powell & Stephen Schwartz, with music and lyrics by Stephen Schwartz.

metadata.title: The Family Plan 2
metadata.overview: Now that Dan's assassin days are behind him, all he wants for Christmas is quality time with his kids. But when he learns his daughter has her own plans, he books a family trip to London‚Äîputting them all in the crosshairs of an unexpected enemy.

raw.overview: Now that Dan's assassin days are behind him, all he wants for Christmas is quality time with his kids. But when he learns his daughter has her own plans, he books a family trip to London‚Äîputting them all in the crosshairs of an unexpected enemy.
raw.tagline: Deck the halls, dodge the bad guys.
raw.title: The Family Plan 2

omdb.Title: The Family Plan 2
omdb.Actors: Michelle Monaghan, Mark Wahlberg, Kit Harington
omdb.Plot: A former government operative is attacked, forcing him and his family to go on the run. Pursued across the country, he protects his loved ones while confronting his dark past and deadly enemies, culminating in a showdown in Las Ve...

snippet.title: The Family Plan 2 ‚Äî Official Trailer | Apple TV
snippet.description:
Deck the halls, dodge the bad guys. The Morgans are back for The Family Plan 2, this time in Europe. Streaming November 21. https://apple.co/_TheFamilyPlan2

Dan Morgan (Mark Wahlberg) is many things: a devoted husband, a loving father, a celebrated car salesman. He‚Äôs also a former assassin. And when his past catches up to his present, he‚Äôs forced to take his unsuspecting family (Michelle Monaghan, Zoe Colletti and Van Crosby) on a road trip unlike any other.

The Family Plan 2 is an Apple Original Film hailing from Skydance Media, the sequel to ‚ÄúThe Family Plan‚Äù will be directed by Simon Cellan Jones. David Ellison, Dana Goldberg and Don Granger will produce for Skydance, alongside Wahlberg and Stephen Levinson through Municipal Pictures. John G. Scotti will executive produce along with Cellan Jones. David Coggeshall, the writer of the first movie, has returned to pen the sequel.

Subscribe to Apple TV‚Äôs YouTube channel: https://apple.co/AppleTVYouTube

metadata.title: Train Dreams
metadata.overview: A logger leads a life of quiet grace as he experiences love and loss during an era of monumental change in early 20th-century America.

raw.overview: A logger leads a life of quiet grace as he experiences love and loss during an era of monumental change in early 20th-century America.
raw.title: Train Dreams

omdb.Title: Train Dreams
omdb.Writer: Clint Bentley, Denis Johnson, Greg Kwedar
omdb.Actors: Kerry Condon, Felicity Jones, Joel Edgerton
omdb.Plot: Based on Denis Johnson's beloved novella, Train Dreams is the moving portrait of Robert Grainier, a logger and railroad worker who leads a life of unexpected depth and beauty in the rapidly-changing America of the early 20th Century.

snippet.title: Train Dreams | Official Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Based on the novella of the same name, Train Dreams is the portrait of Robert Grainier, a logger and railroad worker who leads a life of unexpected depth and beauty in the rapidly changing America of the early 20th Century.

Joel Edgerton, Felicity Jones, Kerry Condon, and William H. Macy star in TRAIN DREAMS, a film from Clint Bentley that ‚Äúcontains all the wondrous, devastating layers of an entire life.‚Äù In select theaters November 7 and on Netflix November 21.

Watch on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/title/82020378

Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services, with over 300 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. metadata.title: After the Hunt
metadata.overview: A college professor finds herself at a personal and professional crossroads when a star pupil levels an accusation against one of her colleagues, and a dark secret from her own past threatens to come to light.

metadata.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
metadata.overview: In the wake of the devastating war against the RDA and the loss of their eldest son, Jake Sully and Neytiri face a new threat on Pandora: the Ash People, a violent and power-hungry Na'vi tribe led by the ruthless Varang. Jake's family must fight for their survival and the future of Pandora in a conflict that pushes them to their emotional and physical limits.

raw.overview: In the wake of the devastating war against the RDA and the loss of their eldest son, Jake Sully and Neytiri face a new threat on Pandora: the Ash People, a violent and power-hungry Na'vi tribe led by the ruthless Varang. Jake's family must fight for their survival and the future of Pandora in a conflict that pushes them to their emotional and physical limits.
raw.tagline: The world of Pandora will change forever.
raw.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash

omdb.Title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
omdb.Writer: James Cameron, Josh Friedman, Rick Jaffa
omdb.Actors: Kate Winslet, Zoe Salda√±a, Edie Falco
omdb.Plot: Jake and Neytiri's family grapples with grief after Neteyam's death, encountering a new, aggressive Na'vi tribe, the Ash People, who are led by the fiery Varang, as the conflict on Pandora escalates and a new moral focus emerges.

snippet.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
From Director James Cameron, watch the trailer for Avatar: Fire and Ash.
Experience the film only in theaters December 19.

With ‚ÄúAvatar: Fire and Ash,‚Äù James Cameron takes audiences back to Pandora in an immersive new adventure with Marine turned Na‚Äôvi leader Jake Sully (Sam Worthington), Na‚Äôvi warrior Neytiri (Zoe Salda√±a), and the Sully family. The film, which has a screenplay by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver, and a story by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver & Josh Friedman & Shane Salerno, also stars Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Oona Chaplin, Cliff Curtis, Britain Dalton, Trinity Bliss, Jack Champion, Bailey Bass and Kate Winslet.

metadata.title: One Battle After Another
metadata.overview: Washed-up revolutionary Bob exists in a state of stoned paranoia, surviving off-grid with his spirited, self-reliant daughter, Willa. When his evil nemesis resurfaces after 16 years and she goes missing, the former radical scrambles to find her, father and daughter both battling the consequences of his past.

raw.overview: Washed-up revolutionary Bob exists in a state of stoned paranoia, surviving off-grid with his spirited, self-reliant daughter, Willa. When his evil nemesis resurfaces after 16 years and she goes missing, the former radical scrambles to find her, father and daughter both battling the consequences of his past.
raw.tagline: Some search for battle, others are born into it...
raw.title: One Battle After Another

omdb.Title: One Battle After Another
omdb.Actors: Teyana Taylor, Leonardo DiCaprio, Regina Hall
omdb.Plot: When their evil enemy resurfaces after 16 years, a group of ex-revolutionaries reunite to rescue the daughter of one of their own.

snippet.title: One Battle After Another | Official Trailer 2
snippet.description:
No fear. #OneBattleAfterAnother only in theaters September 26.

From Warner Bros. Pictures and Academy Award-nominated, BAFTA-winning filmmaker Paul Thomas Anderson comes ‚ÄúOne Battle After Another,‚Äù starring Academy Award and BAFTA winner Leonardo DiCaprio.

Oscar and BAFTA winners Sean Penn and Benicio Del Toro also star alongside Regina Hall, Teyana Taylor and Chase Infiniti, as well as Wood Harris and Alana Haim.

Anderson directs from his own screenplay. The producers are Oscar and BAFTA nominees Adam Somner and Sara Murphy and Anderson, with Will Weiske executive producing.

The creative team behind the camera includes several frequent collaborators, among them directors of photography Michael Bauman and Anderson; Oscar-nominated, BAFTA-winning production designer Florencia Martin; BAFTA-nominated editor Andy Jurgensen; Oscar and BAFTA-winning costume designer Colleen Atwood; casting director Cassandra Kulukundis; and with music by Oscar- and BAFTA-nominated composer Jonny Greenwood.

Warner Bros. Pictures Presents A Ghoulardi Film Company Production, A Paul Thomas Anderson Film, ‚ÄúOne Battle After Another.‚Äù Distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures, the film will be in theaters and IMAX¬Æ nationwide on September 26, 2025, and internationally beginning 24 September 2025.

localized.description:
No fear. #OneBattleAfterAnother only in theaters September 26.

Oscar and BAFTA winners Sean Penn and Benicio Del Toro also star alongside Regina Hall, Teyana Taylor and Chase Infiniti, as well as Wood Harris and Alana Haim.

Anderson directs from his own screenplay. The producers are Oscar and BAFTA nominees Adam Somner and Sara Murphy and Anderson, with Will Weiske executive producing.

The creative team behind the camera includes several frequent collaborators, among them directors of photography Michael Bauman and Anderson; Oscar-nominated, BAFTA-winning production designer Florencia Martin; BAFTA-nominated editor Andy Jurgensen; Oscar and BAFTA-winning costume designer Colleen Atwood; casting director Cassandra Kulukundis; and with music by Oscar- and BAFTA-nominated composer Jonny Greenwood.

Warner Bros. Pictures Presents A Ghoulardi Film Company Production, A Paul Thomas Anderson Film, ‚ÄúOne Battle After Another.‚Äù Distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures, the film will be in theaters and IMAX¬Æ nationwide on September 26, 2025, and internationally beginning 24 September 2025.

metadata.title: Playdate
metadata.overview: When out-of-work accountant Brian joins stay-at-home dad Jeff for a playdate with their sons, he expects a laid-back afternoon. Instead, they're chased by mercenaries, and Brian‚Äîtotally unprepared‚Äîmust survive one absurd obstacle after another.

raw.overview: When out-of-work accountant Brian joins stay-at-home dad Jeff for a playdate with their sons, he expects a laid-back afternoon. Instead, they're chased by mercenaries, and Brian‚Äîtotally unprepared‚Äîmust survive one absurd obstacle after another.

omdb.Title: Playdate
omdb.Actors: Alan Ritchson, Kevin James, Banks Pierce
omdb.Plot: Brian has just been fired from his job. He becomes a stay-at-home dad. He accepts a playdate invitation from another stay-at-home dad who turns out to be a loose cannon.

metadata.title: Frankenstein
metadata.overview: Dr. Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant but egotistical scientist, brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.

snippet.title: Frankenstein | Guillermo del Toro | Official Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Written and directed by Guillermo del Toro, FRANKENSTEIN is on Netflix November 7. Starring Oscar Isaac, Jacob Elordi, Mia Goth, Felix Kammerer, with Charles Dance, and Christoph Waltz.

Oscar-winning director Guillermo del Toro adapts Mary Shelley‚Äôs classic tale of Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant but egotistical scientist who brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.

metadata.title: Black Phone 2
metadata.overview: Four years after escaping The Grabber, Finney Blake is struggling with his life after captivity. When his sister Gwen begins receiving calls in her dreams from the black phone and seeing disturbing visions of three boys being stalked at a winter camp, the siblings become determined to solve the mystery and confront a killer who has grown more powerful in death and more significant to them than either could imagine.

omdb.Actors: Ethan Hawke, Mason Thames, Madeleine McGraw

snippet.title: Black Phone 2 | Official Trailer 2
snippet.description:
What do you think happens when you die? Black Phone 2 only in theaters October 17.


-
Four years ago, 13-year-old Finn killed his abductor and escaped, becoming the sole survivor of The Grabber. But true evil transcends death ‚Ä¶ and the phone is ringing again. 

Four-time Academy Award¬Æ nominee Ethan Hawke returns to the most sinister role of his career as The Grabber seeks vengeance on Finn (Mason Thames) from beyond the grave by menacing Finn‚Äôs younger sister, Gwen (Madeleine McGraw). 

As Finn, now 17, struggles with life after his captivity, the headstrong 15-year-old Gwen begins receiving calls in her dreams from the black phone and seeing disturbing visions of three boys being stalked at a winter camp known as Alpine Lake. 

Determined to solve the mystery and end the torment for both her and her brother, Gwen persuades Finn to visit the camp during a winter storm. There, she uncovers a shattering intersection between The Grabber and her own family‚Äôs history. Together, she and Finn must confront a killer who has grown more powerful in death and more significant to them than either could imagine.

From returning visionary writer-director Scott Derrickson, Black Phone 2 is written again by Derrickson & C. Robert Cargill, based on characters created by Joe Hill. The film is produced by Jason Blum, Derrickson and Cargill. The executive producers are Adam Hendricks and Ryan Turek.

The cast includes Oscar¬Æ nominee Demi√°n Bichir (The Nun, A Better Life) as the supervisor of the camp, Arianna Rivas (A Working Man) as his niece, Miguel Mora (The Black Phone) as the brother of one of The Grabber‚Äôs victims, and Jeremy Davies, returning as Finn and Gwen‚Äôs father, Terrence. Other new cast members include Maev Beaty (Beau is Afraid) and Graham Abbey (Under the Banner of Heaven). 

Universal Pictures and Blumhouse‚Äôs horror phenomenon The Black Phone, released in 2022, received widespread critical acclaim and earned more than $160 million.


Follow Black Phone on socials:
https://www.instagram.com/blackphonemovie/ 
https://www.facebook.com/TheBlackPhoneMovie
www.blackphonemovie.com 

Find Universal Pictures on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/universalpictures/ 
Follow Universal Pictures on X at https://www.twitter.com/universalpictures/ 
Follow Universal Pictures on Facebook at: https://facebook.com/UniversalPictures 
https://www.universalpictures.com/

metadata.title: Zootopia 2
metadata.overview: After cracking the biggest case in Zootopia's history, rookie cops Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde find their partnership isn't as solid as they thought when Chief Bogo orders them to join the Partners in Crisis counseling program. But it doesn't take long for their partnership to be put to the ultimate test when they find themselves on the twisting trail of a mystery tied to the arrival of a venomous snake in the animal metropolis.

But it doesn't take long for their partnership to be put to the ultimate test when they find themselves on the twisting trail of a mystery tied to the arrival of a venomous snake in the animal metropolis.

omdb.Title: Zootopia 2
omdb.Actors: Jason Bateman, Quinta Brunson, Fortune Feimster
omdb.Plot: Brave rabbit cop Judy Hopps and her friend, the fox Nick Wilde, team up again to crack a new case, the most perilous and intricate of their careers.

snippet.title: Zootopia 2 | Official Trailer (2025)
snippet.description: Key Huy Quan, Fortune Feimster and Quinta Brunson join the voice cast alongside Ginnifer Goodwin and Jason Bateman in this follow-up to 2016's 'Zootopia.' 'Zootopia 2' is in theaters on Nov. 26.
